doc: give a specific amount of specified items to the target
character. If the character is not online, nothing will happen.
If <account ID> is not specified, items will be created in the invoking

paramDoc.itemID: Item ID to be given (can be AegisName constant)
paramDoc.itemName:
Name of the item to be given (as in english name field).
**Not Recommended** - use Aegis Name (ID) instead.
paramDoc.amount: Amount of this item to be given
paramDoc.accountID: Account that will receive the item (if it is online)
